text: Explain the difference between an array and a linked list.
tips: Mention memory layout (contiguous vs nodes/pointers), access time (O(1) vs O(n) and operations (insert/delete).

text: What is a RESTTful API and why is it useful?
tips: Define statelessness, resource-based URIs, HTTP methods, and JSON payloads.

text: How would you secure user passwords in a web application?
tips: Explain salted hashing (bcrypt/argon2) and , HTTPS, and basic auth-- hardening practices.
